query:
SELECT 
                n.collection_id, 
                n.uri, 
                jsonb_agg(DISTINCT n.id)    AS nft_ids,
                MIN(n.updated_at)           AS updated_at              
            FROM nfts n
                LEFT JOIN nft_metadata nm ON nm.uri = n.uri 
            WHERE n.uri ILIKE '%.json' AND nm.uri IS NULL
            GROUP BY n.collection_id, n.uri
            ORDER BY updated_at ASC
            LIMIT $1 OFFSET $2
